s2.title: The JAXP/TrAX API
s2.p: XSLTC is 100% compliant with the TrAX poriton of the JAXP API. This API is a standard extension to Java and there is not much point in describing it in detail in this document.

s2.title: XSLTC's extensions to JAXP/TrAX
